articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra tipped for early 2022 release carrying 14.6-inch OLED display, 5G - PhoneArena
articles.description: Samsung will reportedly release three new high-end tablets early next year including the extremely powerful Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra which is rumored to be equipped with a 14.6-inch OLED display.
